value.title: Guess which Pro! 4 pros play under secret identities in our Hidden Name Tournament - StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: WHO ARE THEY? In this Hidden Name Tournament, we have 4 StarCraft pro players competing against each other but they don't know who their opponents are. They are playing for a prize pool so there is a need to be competitive, however, if no other player can guess who they are they earn extra prize money!
